reference

The Marginal Obsession with Marginalia

O’Connell, Mark. “The Marginal Obsession with Marginalia.” The New Yorker, 26 Jan. 2012, [https://www.newyorker.com/books/page-turner/the-marginal-obsession-with-marginalia].
